translation.en: [panting] I'm on the surface. I'm on the surface.
[yells] The sun!
I looked at the sun! I'll go blind!
translation.it: Ho guardato il sole! Diventerò cieca!

translation.en: Wait, I can still see.
[exclaims] I can't be here. I can't be here. I can't be here.
Out of my way, rocks!
Dad! Can you hear me?
[sighs] Of course not. He could be miles away.
translation.it: Certo che no. Potrebbe essere molto lontano.

translation.en: OK. [inhales sharply] You can do this, Kipo.
You got this.
Humans lived on the surface for thousands of years.
translation.it: Gli uomini hanno vissuto in superficie per migliaia di anni.

translation.en: You can handle a few minutes up here.
translation.it: Puoi restare quassù anche tu per qualche minuto.

translation.en: You just have to find your way home.
translation.it: Devi solo ritrovare la strada verso casa.

translation.en: Flowers.
A lot bigger than they are in books.
translation.it: Sono molto più grandi di quelli nei libri.

translation.en: ♪ Up on top, on my own ♪
♪ A human girl so far from home ♪
translation.it: Una ragazza umana è lontana da casa

translation.en: ♪ The flowers are big ♪
♪ The bees are weird ♪
♪ It's dangerous ♪
♪ Just like I feared ♪
♪ On the surface world ♪
Stay away!
Hmm... Let's see, the current took me left, then right.
translation.it: Vediamo... La corrente mi ha spinta a sinistra e poi a destra.

translation.en: And then there was the long part.
translation.it: Poi c'è stata la parte lunga.

translation.en: [stammering] And the... And the short part.
And then the loop-dee-do.
And then I went way over here, so, my home must be in this direction.
translation.it: E poi sono finita qua, perciò casa mia dev'essere in questa direzione.

translation.en: Or was it left, then loop-dee-do?
translation.it: Oppure sono finita a sinistra e poi il vortice?

translation.en: Or... or... loop-dee-do, then left?
translation.it: O c'è stato il vortice e poi a sinistra?

translation.en: [gasps] Who are you, little one?
You're adorable.
Uh, sorry.
Didn't expect you to come with extra eyes.
translation.it: Non immaginavo che avessi tanti occhi!

translation.en: I'm a friend.
Oh! You come with an extra pair of everything!
translation.it: Allora hai un paio in più di tutto!

translation.en: I only have two legs. So boring.
translation.it: Io ho solo due gambe. Che noia!

translation.en: -I have to pet you. -[squealing]
[Kipo] Wait! Come back!
You can run, pig. But I will find you, and I will pet you.
translation.it: Corri quanto voi, maialino. Tanto ti troverò e ti accarezzerò.

translation.en: I somehow feel like I've been wearing you my whole life.
translation.it: Mi sembra di indossare questi vestiti da sempre.

translation.en: Piggy!
I can help you with that.
We have vending machines like this in my burrow.
translation.it: Abbiamo distributori simili nel mio cunicolo.

translation.en: I know all the tricks.
There's a wire back here.
translation.it: Qua dietro c'è un filo elettrico.

translation.en: If I could just get to it.
That works, too.
Whoa! You were hungry, weren't you?
Hey, wanna try something fun?
You ready?
Yeah!
Humans from the old world.
translation.it: Ecco gli esseri umani del vecchio mondo.

translation.en: This is a school!
I go to school, too.
Underground with lots of other kids.
No windows, though. My father teaches there.
translation.it: Ma non ci sono finestre. Mio padre insegna lì.

translation.en: "Kipo, how many light years are in a parsec?"
translation.it: "Kipo, quanti anni luce corrispondono a un parsec?"

translation.en: Although, a lot of good that does me up here.
translation.it: Ma non mi servirà molto quassù in superficie.

translation.en: My whole life they taught us the surface was this horrible place.
translation.it: Per tutta la vita ci hanno insegnato che la superficie era un posto orribile.

translation.en: -But look at you. -[snorting]
You look just like these dumplings my dad makes.
translation.it: Somigli ai ravioli che fa mio padre.

translation.en: They're called "mandu."
[gasps] That's it! I'm gonna call you "Mandu."
I'm gonna get you!
-[squealing] -I'm gonna get you, Mandu!
Mandu, I have to pet this bunny, now.
translation.it: Mandu, devo accarezzare subito questo coniglietto.

translation.en: It's gonna be OK.
Hi, there. Aren't you fluffy.
Oh, you like that.
Oh! There's another one.
OK, OK! Everyone wait your turn.
You're all so soft, but there's only one of me.
translation.it: Siete tutti morbidi, ma io sono una sola.

translation.en: And that must be the mother.
Can you talk, mute?
I'm no barbarian. If a mute can talk, it's not chow.
translation.it: Non sono una selvaggia. Se un mutante parla, non diventa cibo.

translation.en: All I need to hear is one little "yes."
-[squeals] -A human?
Sorry, but a girl's gotta eat.
Wait! [grunts]
I was wondering when you were gonna come out of there.
translation.it: Mi chiedevo quando saresti sbucata da lì.

translation.en: You're human! On the surface.
translation.it: Sei un essere umano! In superficie.

translation.en: You don't miss a thing, do you?
-[Mandu squealing] -[gasps] Wait. You can't eat my friend.
translation.it: Aspetta, non mangiare il mio amico.

translation.en: If you want a bacon sandwich, go catch your own pig.
translation.it: Se vuoi pane e pancetta, catturati un maiale tutto tuo.

translation.en: I already called dibs on this one.
-Mandu is no sandwich! -She's about to be.
translation.it: - Mandu non si mangia! - Invece sì.

translation.en: [gasps] Say, your staff is so pointy.
-Where'd you get it from? -Off a giant scorpion.
translation.it: - Dove l'hai preso? - Da uno scorpione gigante.

translation.en: It was trespassing in my camp.
-[squealing] -Oh, no, you don't!
-Hey! Run, Mandu! -Let go!
What is wrong with you?
Now we're both out of a meal.
How can you eat her? She's adorable!
translation.it: Come hai pensato di poterlo mangiare? È così adorabile.

translation.en: I've eaten plenty of adorable.
And there's lots more adorable that's tried to eat me.
Do you have any hand sanitizer?
translation.it: Hai del disinfettante per le mani?

translation.en: You must not be from around here.
translation.it: Si vede che non sei di queste parti.

translation.en: Are you one of those underground mole people?
You've heard of us!
I didn't think there were any humans left up here anymore.
translation.it: Pensavo che ci non fossero più uomini quassù.

translation.en: For your lost lunch.
Listen, I'm trying to find my way home.
translation.it: Senti, sto cercando la strada di casa mia.

translation.en: You clearly look like you grew up around here.
translation.it: Tu dai l'idea di essere cresciuta in questa zona.

translation.en: Maybe you could help me find...
it.
[grunting] Kipo. My name's Kipo.
And... and I really need your help right now.
translation.it: E ho davvero bisogno del tuo aiuto ora.

translation.en: You're not gone? That's annoying.
Look, there was a mute-quake.
A lot of people I care about could be hurt.
translation.it: Molte persone a me care potrebbero essere ferite.

translation.en: I really need to get home.
Not my problem.
First lesson of the surface: Up here, you don't shout like that.
translation.it: Prima lezione in superficie: quassù non si grida a squarciagola.

translation.en: It's called "ringing the dinner bell."
Free advice.
Hey, you, wolf girl!
Yeah! You, walking away from me!
translation.it: Sì, proprio tu che scappi da me!

translation.en: I'm still talking to you!
Fine. I don't need you anyway.
translation.it: Va bene, non ho bisogno di te.

translation.en: Oh, hi. You look friendly.
That's your last freebie.
translation.it: È l'ultimo favore che ti faccio.

translation.en: Fine. I'll just go this way instead.
translation.it: Va bene, me ne andrò da questa parte.

translation.en: Really? You're just gonna walk right into Death Ivy?
translation.it: Dici sul serio? Vuoi addentrarti nella Death Ivy?

translation.en: [groans] You're not gonna last five minutes.
Look, I'll help you get home.
translation.it: Senti, ti aiuterò a tornare a casa.

translation.en: But once you're back, I'm out.
translation.it: Ma appena sarai arrivata, me ne vado.

translation.en: -Up here, I work alone. Got it? -Oh, thank you!
translation.it: - Quassù io lavoro da sola. Hai capito? - Grazie!

translation.en: No hugging.
I knew you were a good person.
translation.it: Sapevo che eri una brava persona.

translation.en: Hey, I just realized I don't know your name.
translation.it: Mi sono appena accorta che non so il tuo nome.

translation.en: -No talking! -Uh, OK.
translation.it: Niente ciance! Ok, allora ti chiamerò Lupetta.

translation.en: I'll just call you "Wolf", then.
I've already been calling you that in my head.
translation.it: Ti chiamavo già così nella mia testa.

translation.en: At first we thought it was a mute passing overhead.
I mean, that happens all the time, right?
We learned a long time ago to anchor all tall furniture.
translation.it: Noi fissiamo i mobili alti al muro da tempo.

translation.en: But this one was, like, an earthquake. I can't imagine how big it was.
translation.it: Ma questo terremoto è stato tanto forte che non immagini.

translation.en: It made an entire cliff fall... while I was on it.
translation.it: Ha fatto crollare un'intera scogliera, mentre ero lì sopra.

translation.en: And then, I landed in the water supply tube and nearly drowned.
translation.it: Sono finita nelle tubature dell'acqua e sono quasi affogata.

translation.en: [gulps] Sounds like a Tuesday.
Listen, Kipo, was it?
Lesson two of the surface: Don't ever tell anyone that story.
translation.it: Seconda lezione in superficie: non raccontare mai questa storia.

translation.en: It could be very dangerous if people know you're from a burrow.
translation.it: È rischioso far sapere che vieni da un cunicolo.

translation.en: And lesson three of the surface: Up here, you never pass up a meal.
translation.it: E terza lezione in superficie: quassù non si saltano i pasti.

translation.en: Crispy on the outside, chewy in the center.
Can you tell me anything about your burrow that might help us find it?
translation.it: Potresti descrivermi il tuo cunicolo per ritrovarlo?

translation.en: Oh, well, there's the underground irrigation system...
translation.it: Beh, c'è il sistema d'irrigazione sotterraneo...

translation.en: which is underground.
[gasps] Oh, wait! The Clover!
How could I forget the Clover?
translation.it: Come ho potuto dimenticare il Quadrifoglio?

translation.en: We live under this barrier called The Great Clover.
translation.it: Noi viviamo sotto il Grande Quadrifoglio.

translation.en: I've never actually seen it, but we use it as our city emblem.
translation.it: Non l'ho mai visto dal vero, ma è il simbolo della nostra città.

translation.en: Hmm. I may know what that is.
translation.it: Forse so di cosa si tratta.

translation.en: We'll make camp here for the night.
translation.it: Ci accamperemo qui per la notte.

translation.en: For the night... out here?
Uh, my dad must be really worried about me right now, so...
translation.it: Mio padre sarà molto in pensiero per me ora, quindi...

translation.en: Uh, did you hear that? Because I definitely did.
It feels like something we should worry about.
So many sparkles! I was not prepared.
translation.it: Guarda che luccichio! Non ero pronta per questo.

translation.en: Why would humans stay underground
when every night they could look up and see this?
translation.it: quando potrebbero godersi questo spettacolo ogni sera?

translation.en: Yeah, it's a real paradise.
That must be the Big Dipper! It's part of Ursa Major.
translation.it: Quello è il Grande Carro, dell'Orsa Maggiore.

translation.en: I'm kind of an astronomy buff even though I've never seen a sky before.
translation.it: Sono un'appassionata di astronomia, anche se non avevo mai visto il cielo.

translation.en: Ooh! And that bright one, that's Polaris!
translation.it: E quel bagliore luminoso è la Stella Polare!

translation.en: You see the one that doesn't make any noise?
Well, none of them make... Oh.
[chuckles nervously] OK. I'll be quiet.
You get sleep.
[gasps] Aries! That's my birth sign.
I've always wanted to see it!
It's supposed to be a ram if you connect the dots.
translation.it: Ha la forma di un ariete, se colleghi i puntini.

translation.en: I guess you can kinda see it if you squint right--
-[Wolf] Kipo! -Oh, right.
Anything that looks useful, take.
translation.it: Prendi tutto ciò che pensi possa essere utile.

translation.en: "October 23rd, 2020."
Yeah, it's expired by about 200 years.
-Found it! -Spot remover?
That's for getting out shirt stains.
No offense, yours may need a full spin cycle.
translation.it: Senza offesa, la tua avrebbe bisogno di una bella lavata.

translation.en: Mega Bunny.
It's a good thing we're inside-- [yells]
translation.it: Meno male che siamo al riparo...

translation.en: -Whoa! -Definitely a Mega Bunny.
I saw that same Mega Bunny earlier.
translation.it: Ho già visto il Coniglio Gigante prima.

translation.en: I named her "Rabbecka." The little ones are so cuddly!
translation.it: L'ho chiamato Rebecca. I suoi cuccioli sono morbidissimi!

translation.en: You touched the babies?
Why did you touch the babies?
Don't you know you can't touch the babies?!
translation.it: Non sai che i cuccioli non si toccano?

translation.en: But they were so cute. [yells]
Aisle six, baking goods. Aisle seven, drinks.
translation.it: Corsia sei, prodotti da forno. Corsia sette, bevande.

translation.en: Aisle eight, bingo!
Pretty sure you got the baby scent off me.
translation.it: Direi che l'odore dei cuccioli non si sente più!

translation.en: You can't be too careful.
translation.it: La prudenza non è mai troppa.

translation.en: Huh? Oh, all out. Oh, thank goodness!
It's a good thing I found this second bottle.
[groans] You've gotta be kidding me!
-[coughing] -This one's Summer Rain.
translation.it: La profumazione di questa è "Pioggia estiva".

translation.en: That is way better than taking the stairs!
translation.it: Questo è molto meglio che fare le scale!

translation.en: If you run into anything, act like you're from the surface.
translation.it: Qualsiasi "cosa" incontri, comportati come se vivessi in superficie.

translation.en: From the surface. Got it.
translation.it: Come se vivessi in superficie, ok.

translation.en: Uh, what are you doing?
[deep voice] I'm from the surface, where life is hard.
translation.it: Io vivo in superficie. La vita qui è difficile.

translation.en: You gotta be tough as nails.
Iron and fire... wearing dead animals.
translation.it: Ferro e fuoco... Indossare animali morti.

translation.en: Good. You're catching on.
This is my angry surface face.
translation.it: Ecco la faccia arrabbiata da superficie.

translation.en: Hmm. [normal voice] Whoa, what's that?
[gasps] There's so much to see when you're not in a cave!
translation.it: Quante cose ci sono da vedere fuori da una grotta!

translation.en: Focus, Kipo.
[Kipo gasps] That must be it!
It looks just like the clover in our emblem.
translation.it: È proprio come il quadrifoglio del nostro emblema.

translation.en: Wow. So, that's my home.
It's half a day's walk from here,
translation.it: Dista mezza giornata a piedi da qui,

translation.en: but we'll have to get over Skyscraper Ridge.
translation.it: ma dovremo superare la Collina delle Macerie.

translation.en: -[Kipo] That looks dangerous. -[Wolf] It is.
I'm really sticking my neck out for you. And for what?
translation.it: Sto rischiando molto per te. E in cambio cosa ottengo?

translation.en: I wish I knew how to repay you.
translation.it: Vorrei poterti ripagare in qualche modo.

translation.en: Or if you wanted to come stay with me,
translation.it: Se volessi restare a casa mia,

translation.en: I'm sure there'd be a place for you in my burrow.
translation.it: ci sarà di certo un posto per te nel mio cunicolo.

translation.en: And go all soft and mushy like the rest of you mole people?
translation.it: Per diventare una pappamolle come voi altre persone-talpa?

translation.en: No, thanks.
Humans.
[gasps] My shirt!
[pants] It won't come out!
[groaning] It's setting!
[panting] Careful! That's one of the Mod Frogs.
You do not wanna mess with them.
translation.it: È meglio non scherzare con loro.

translation.en: You're a talking frog!
I mean, I've seen tons of talking frogs before...
translation.it: Cioè, ho visto migliaia di rane parlanti...

translation.en: that wear suits.
No... No biggie.
What my friend here means to say is, we have this!
translation.it: Ciò che voleva dire la mia amica qui è che noi abbiamo questo!

translation.en: Spot remover! Give it to me!
If you let us go.
[gasps] Look, this is my private office.
translation.it: Sentite, questo è il mio ufficio privato.

translation.en: Was there an "enjoy the view" sign on my door?
translation.it: Sulla mia porta c'era forse un cartello "Ammirate la vista"?

translation.en: I think not.
We're Mega Bunny hunters. We were just scouting.
translation.it: Siamo cacciatori di Conigli Giganti. Eravamo in perlustrazione.

translation.en: [groans] Just give me the spot remover.
Then I'll decide what to do with you.
translation.it: Deciderò dopo cosa farne di voi.

translation.en: [shrieking] Oh, thank... Huh?
Mega Bunny hunters. Right.
Looked more like a burrow girl to me.
translation.it: A me sembrava una ragazza del cunicolo.

translation.en: [sighs] This does not get old.
translation.it: È una cosa che non stanca mai.

translation.en: Lesson five on the surface: Looking up... gets you killed.
translation.it: Quinta lezione in superficie: se guardi in alto, rischi di morire.

translation.en: [gasps] Mandu! You came back!
Here, girl!
Something's wrong.
Yeah, you're pointing a nightmare stick at a tiny pig.
translation.it: Stai puntando un bastone spaventoso su un maialino.

translation.en: How do you expect the poor thing to react?
I'm not the one who spooked her.
translation.it: Non sono io ad averlo spaventato.

translation.en: Oh, burrow girl! I figured out where you're from.
translation.it: Ragazza del cunicolo! Ho capito da dove vieni.

translation.en: Shocker... a burrow!
You could lead us to the mother lode of humans.
translation.it: Potresti condurci alla miniera d'oro degli esseri umani.

translation.en: [frog] Ah, just a pig.
-[gasps] -[frog] Eh, at least now we have a snack.
I won't let them take her.
And risk our necks for a mute?
translation.it: Rischiando la vita per un mutante?

translation.en: See, this is why I work alone.
translation.it: Ecco perché lavoro sempre da sola.

translation.en: If you like to be alone so bad, maybe you should be.
translation.it: Se desideri tanto stare da sola, così sia.

translation.en: Put the pig down right now!
Burrow girl, there you are.
Uh... That pig is a bloodthirsty killer.
translation.it: Quel maiale è uno spietato assassino.

translation.en: -She'll tear you limb from limb. -Mm, yeah. I'll take my chances.
translation.it: Ti farà a pezzi. Certo, correrò il rischio.

translation.en: Wolf! You came back!
Yep.
[gasps] Is he dead?
No, but when he wakes up, he'll have a bad headache...
translation.it: No, ma si sveglierà con un bel mal di testa...

translation.en: and possibly some memory loss.
We'll hole up here.
[grunts] Normally, at night, I'd be at home doing my homework.
translation.it: Di solito, la sera sono a casa a fare i compiti.

translation.en: Eating a muffin.
Not running away from homicidal frogs!
[frog] Oh... Oh, my head.
I... Wait a minute, why are you following me?
translation.it: Un attimo, perché mi state seguendo?

translation.en: [henchman] Uh, Jamack, we're looking for those humans.
[Jamack] Oh, yeah, right. Yeah, just... duh.
Let's... let's get back to that then.
Since we've had our first fight and makeup,
translation.it: Visto che abbiamo litigato e fatto la pace,

translation.en: that makes us officially sisters.
-Don't. -Uh, right.
[gasps] There's a baby here.
Why is there a baby here?
We have to shut that thing up.
OK, we really need you to hush, little baby.
I'll put him to sleep.
There's a slight chance this'll kill him.
Don't you dare!
A mute? You gotta be kidding me!
It's still a baby!
[Jamack] Check every room!
Do you know any grub nursery rhymes?
